member.name: T:Common.Configuration.Profiler
member.summary: The profiler class helps in profiling code sections. It outputs the time required to code completion and memory used before and afterwads.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.InvokeGarbageCollector
member.summary: If true, is called right before the profiling ends.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.Watch
member.summary: A reference to the stopwatch being used to calculate the execution time.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.Duration
member.summary: Shortcut to . Returns TimeSpan.MinValue, if the watch has not been initialized, yet.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.MemAtBeginning
member.summary: Holds the amount of memory being used by the application at the beginning of the profiling.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.MemAtEnd
member.summary: Holds the amount of memory being used by the application at the end of the profiling.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.Profiler.MemUsage
member.summary: Difference of and .

member.name: E:Common.Configuration.Profiler.Output
member.summary: This event is raised at the end of the profiling and contains the profiling summary. If no event handler is specified, the output goes to the debugger (if available).

member.name: T:Common.Configuration.Profiler.WriteDelegate
member.summary: Function signature to use when receiving the profiling summary ().
member.param: A string containing the profiling summary.

member.name: M:Common.Configuration.GenericConfiguration.GetDirectType(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the type of the object. If the type is of a Castle.Proxies type, the base type is returned.

member.name: P:Common.Configuration.GenericConfiguration.BoundObject
member.summary: Represents the object that this configuration is bound to.
